i m about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon.

i collect single malt scotch.

content.text: Hi I am from Tennessee, how about you?
I am from a warm climate, I live in a city with a lot of people
What do you do for fun?
I collect single malt scotch, I eat out a lot, and I have an iguana
That sounds cool, I build things, cook, and listen to music
What kind of things do you build?
I build furniture, decorations, and things for my family
That sounds really cool, I wish I could be more crafty
It's not that hard, if you're into woodworking you could start with something easy like a cutting board
I've never been good at woodworking, I'm more of a cook
Cooking is great too, I love trying new ethnic foods
Me too, I've always been interested in cooking different types of food
I like Indian food a lot, but I also like Thai food
Thai food is really good, I love the curry
I love curries too, they're so flavorful
I'm excited to try new foods in college, I'm going to a very liberal school
That sounds fun, I'm sure you'll find some great food there
